sentences.en: All you see on TV is sex and violence these days.
sentences.cn: 如今在电视上看到的尽是性和暴力。

sentences.en: Do avoid potentially contentious subjects such as religion, sex or politics.
sentences.cn: 一定要避免可能引起争议的话题，如宗教、性和政治。

sentences.en: He wanted sex with Julie but she rebuffed him.
sentences.cn: 他想和朱莉上床但被她拒绝了。

sentences.en: He was very open in his attitudes about sex.
sentences.cn: 他对待性的态度非常开放。

sentences.en: Her publisher wants her to spice up her stories with sex.
sentences.cn: 她的出版商想让她在小说中增添些性描写以吸引读者。

sentences.en: I'm sick of reading headlines involving the Kennedys in sex scandals.
sentences.cn: 关于肯尼迪家族性丑闻的新闻标题都让我读得腻烦了。

sentences.en: Mention sex therapy and most people will titter in embarrassment.
sentences.cn: 提及性治疗，大多数人会尴尬地偷笑。

sentences.en: Put your name and sex at the top of the form.
sentences.cn: 在表格的上端填上你的姓名和性别。

sentences.en: She no longer wanted to have sex with him.
sentences.cn: 她再也不想和他做爱了。

sentences.en: The community reacted quickly and spread the word about safe sex.
sentences.cn: 社区迅速作出反应，宣传安全性行为。

sentences.en: the dangers of casual sex
sentences.cn: 性关系随便的危险性

sentences.en: The entire film revolves around drugs, sex and violence.
sentences.cn: 整个影片围绕着毒品、性和暴力展开。

sentences.en: The majority of sex offenders have a low opinion of themselves.
sentences.cn: 大多数性犯罪者都瞧不起自己。

sentences.en: The male sex comes out of the film very badly.
sentences.cn: 这部影片中男性的形象非常负面。

sentences.en: The new technique has been used to identify the sex of foetuses.
sentences.cn: 这一新技术已经被用来鉴别胎儿的性别。

sentences.en: The Sex Discrimination Act has not eliminated discrimination in employment.
sentences.cn: 《反性别歧视法》并未根除工作中的歧视。

sentences.en: They had sex in the back seat of his car.
sentences.cn: 他们在他的汽车后座上做了爱。

sentences.en: They sat me down and had a serious discussion about sex.
sentences.cn: 他们让我坐下，然后和我严肃地探讨了有关性的话题。

sentences.en: They wanted to modernise the programme, sex it up.
sentences.cn: 他们想让节目现代化，更富吸引力。

sentences.en: We know some sex offenders dupe the psychologists who assess them.
sentences.cn: 我们知道有些性犯罪者会愚弄给他们做测评的心理学家。

words.tran_cn: 性别主义者的；性别歧视者的
无性的；中性的；性冷淡的；无性征的（名词sexlessness，副词sexlessly）
（针对女性的）性别歧视；男性至上主义
性别歧视者；男性至上主义者
确定性别；引起性兴奋（sex的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 安全性行为（通常特别指利用避孕套来避免受爱滋病等传播）
性别差异；两性差别；性的差别

trans.tran_cn: 性别，两性之一，性，性特征，性活动
trans.tran_en: the physical activity that two people do together in order to produce babies, or for pleasure

trans.tran_cn: 引起…的性欲；区别…的性别
trans.tran_en: to find out whether an animal is male or female

trans.tran_cn: 辨识性别，引起性欲，吸引
